title: Kalista you do no damage to the 4K HP 300 Armor Maokai and Malphite.

replies.body:
Kalista is very dependant on her support 
she requires: 
1. a strong understanding of her kit and what support champions effect her kit and playstyle and more importantly her matchups **(every support champion changes the way she should be played and the matchups she plays against)**
2. a strong synergy between the adc and support
3. a support who actually understands the role of support and how to work with kalista

This is needed to get you through laning and mid game which is when the tank meta is strongest

If she gets ahead, great she can kinda work, but if she gets behind.. she's garbage, and very hard to recover, so overall not a solid pick for solo Q

Shouldn't be using kalista until your high diamond / master / challenger.. 

Or playing ranked 5's

You can and should adapt your build, though. You don't have to follow the cookie-cutter Hurricane build just because it's usually strong. When you know you're against Malph + Maokai from the start, consider rushing BotRK into Ghostblade and LW. Also, your CS was terrible. You should have had 2-3 times the farm you ended up with in a game that length. If you had twice the CS, you would have had at least another item. That would have made a large difference in damage.

It's easy to scoff and claim "this guy was too tanky, of course I won't be dealing damage to him" but sometimes you need to consider whether or not you could have made a difference through your own actions.
